extension.summary: Archive VDR Recordings as mp4 video files.
Archivierung von VDR Aufnahmen als mp4-Videodateien.
extension.description: This addon lets you select locally stored VDR recordings to get archived as mp4 video files at the configured destination. The conversion is handled by a service which runs in the background. It requires python-dateutil and ffmpeg being installed on your system.
